abstract: Justin Gatlin wins 100 meters at Golden Grand Prix event in Kawasaki, Japan; other track and field news noted.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Track and Field; Gatlin Victorious in Japan
headline.main: Justin Gatlin Wins at Golden Grand Prix Event

snippet: Gatlin of the United States clocked 10.02 seconds to win the 100 meters at a Golden Grand Prix event in Kawasaki, Japan.
lead_paragraph: Gatlin of the United States clocked 10.02 seconds to win the 100 meters at a Golden Grand Prix event in Kawasaki, Japan.
